thread.title: George Elliott

author: George Elliott
title: George Elliott
text: To all of the staff at Clearwater FL location I could have not dealt with great group from the GM Vince to the Manger Mike and the sales team Jon and the rest you guys did a outstanding job will refer friends to anyone give there team a chance they will get you results and get you into a car not just a car but what you have been hunting for and they will go to bat for you to secure that unit for you stop on by and see them work for you great job team
